text: kavuna nivu (o muham'mad!) Dini (i satyadharmam) vaipunake varini piluvu. Mariyu niku ajnapincabadina vidhanga danipai sthiranga undu. Mariyu vari korikalanu anusarincaku. Mariyu varito ila anu: "Allah avatarimpajesina granthanne nenu visvasincanu. Mariyu mi madhya n'yayam ceyamani nenu ajnapincabaddanu. Allah ye ma prabhuvu! Mariyu mi prabhuvu kudanu, ma karmalu maku mariyu mi karmalu miku, ma madhya mariyu mi madhya elanti vivadam undanavasaram ledu. Allah manandarini samavesaparustadu. Mariyu ayana vaipe (manandari) gamyasthanamundi
